casebody.data:
Hubert CHAMBERS, Plaintiff-Employee
v.
TRANSIT MANAGEMENT, Defendant-Employer,
Self Insured (Compensation Claims Solutions, Servicing Agent). No. 527A05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 3, 2007. John Brem Smith, Jennifer Ingram Mitchell, Charlotte, M. Duane Jones, for Transit Management. Robert A. Whitlow, John F. Ayers, III, Charlotte, for Hubert Chambers. Samuel A. Scudder, S. Neal Camak, George W. Lennon, Raleigh, Charles R. Hassell, Jr., for Academy of Trial Lawyers.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 22nd day of December 2006 for rehearing of the decision of this Court pursuant to Rule 31, N.C. Rules of Appellate Procedure, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of January 2007."

Justice MARTIN recused.
